result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Neglecting a Child (No Harm and Child < 6 Yrs or Disability)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angelia Lynn Kooyman

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:24 PM Defendant Angelia Lynn Kooyman appeared by phone.  Attorney Keith Kolby Venema appeared by video for Angelia Lynn Kooyman.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Keith Kolby Venema
Adjourned initial appearance on October 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Activity: Adjourned initial appearance

Adjourned initial appearance on September 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance

2:19 PM   Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Angelia Lynn Kooyman not in court.  Court orders warrant on defendant's non-appearance. Cash bond of $250 set.  
RECALLED 3:08 pm Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Angelia Lynn Kooyman appeared by audio.  Defendant to contact public defender.

10:32 AM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Angelia Lynn Kooyman appeared by phone. Matter continued to allow defendant time to obtain an attorney.

Adjourned initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Adjourned initial appearance on August 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

3:09 PM Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Angelia Lynn Kooyman appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz appeared by video for Angelia Lynn Kooyman. Defendant address and date of birth verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $1000 with conditions.  No unsupervised contact with J.B. Comply with all CPS orders.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No unsupervised contact with JB and comply with all CPS directives.
